name: workflow-suggestion-hardening
description: Run multiple workflow suggestions, validate JSON, and report parse/validation issues.

steps.title: Generate suggestions
steps.description: Request workflow suggestions for 3 topics (ops, ux, infra) and capture raw responses + parsed JSON.

steps.title: Validate JSON
steps.description: Apply schema validation to each suggestion; record failures and offending fields.

steps.title: Report fixes
steps.description: Summarize parse/validation errors and propose prompt or parsing adjustments to improve success rate.
